title: Strengthening E-Learning Practical Competencies: Video Game-Based Comparison of DNA Extraction Teaching Methods

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level subject-matter expertise and problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: Competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Students can clearly explain three step-by-step differences in the DNA extraction process between virtual labs and video game simulations
Students can write a 500-character report comparing the advantages/disadvantages of two methodologies using quantitative/qualitative criteria (e.g., time efficiency, cost, accessibility)
Students can derive two insights applicable to real-world experimental design based on data acquired in a game-based learning environment

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
